'''Bennett''' is a playable [[Pyro]] [[character]] in ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

An orphan discovered by an elderly adventurer as a baby, Bennett was raised in [[Mondstadt|Mondstadt's]] [[Adventurers' Guild]]. He is the one and only member of "[[Benny's Adventure Team]]," as everyone else left the team after experiencing the constant misfortune that follows him.
